properties.areaDesc: 5NM East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage; Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 15 at 9:55AM EST until February 16 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, southwest winds 20 to 25 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt and waves 7 to 10 feet occurring. For the
Small Craft Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to
30 kt and waves 6 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI and 5NM East of a
line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 1 PM EST this afternoon.
For the Small Craft Advisory, from 1 PM this afternoon to 4 AM
EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EST SUNDAY
